channel.title: New npc?
channel.description:
Well, my server has spriit shields and shit..
So i was wondering 'how' in the world, do you actually make a new npc ? im looking to make Corporeal beast.
But... I've looked for guides on google and everything but notihng actually says anythng tbh.
Help Appreciated.
